data.title: Purchase Program
data.meta_description: We’ll Pickup Your Spent Aluminum Oxide and Spent Steel Abrasive.
data.text:
SPENT ABRASIVE PICKUP PROGRAM

We’ll Pickup Your Spent Aluminum Oxide and Spent Steel Abrasive. We’ll schedule a convenient pickup time and take away your used media. It’s effortless, environmentally conscious and if your spent abrasive qualifies—can be profitable too!

Please Note that GMA Industries DOES NOT ACCEPT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS

To ensure that your material is non-hazardous, we require a Toxicity Characteristics Leaching Procedure (TCLP) report. If a TCLP is not readily available, a completed Non-Hazardous Material Statement can be submitted prior to shipment. Follow these next three steps:

Collect one pound of your spent aluminum oxide material and/or steel abrasive.

Label your sample with your company name, the product, size, quantity, and work area.

Mail To:

GMA Industries, Inc

Attention: Lab Sample

38127 Ecorse Road

Romulus, MI 48174-1349

Once the material is verified as acceptable for recycling, GMA Industries will contact you about specific packaging instructions, paperwork requirements, and transportation arrangements.

ONLY want to get rid of your spent aluminum oxide abrasive media? GMA Industries can help out!
